attributes.name: G. The Affair of the Late Lord Harble

attribs.name: senses
attribs.current: Greater Darkvision, Tremorsense (Imprecise) 100 feet, True Seeing

attribs.name: languages
attribs.current: Abyssal, Aklo, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Halfling, Infernal, Undercommon; Telepathy 200 feet

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxTBffbwB6UISLTrjq_description
attribs.current: When a conqueror worm communicates telepathically, its overwhelming will bolsters its lies. Its Deception checks and Deception DCs aren’t penalized for elaborate or unbelievable telepathic lies.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxTIpcGkAtKH2g-mJz_trigger
attribs.current: A creature communicates telepathically with the conqueror worm (even to respond to the conqueror worm’s telepathy or through a mental spell like sending) or fails a saving throw against a mental spell cast by the conqueror worm;

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxTIpcGkAtKH2g-mJz_description
attribs.current:
Effect The conqueror worm infects the mind of the creature, allowing it to mentally contact the creature from afar. The creature must attempt a DC 48 Will saving throw and is temporarily immune for 1 year.
Critical Success The target is unaffected and can’t be affected by the conqueror worm’s Mental Invader ever again. 
Success The target is stupefied 1 for 1 minute.
Failure As success, and the conqueror worm can target the creature with telepathy and mental spells regardless of distance, so long as the worm and target are on the same plane. This bond is permanent and can be broken only by miracle, wish, or similar magic. The conqueror worm can maintain a maximum of 10 connections with Mental Invader. If another creature would be infected, the worm must choose to one of its existing connections end, or if the worm prefers to keep its current 10 connections, the new creature isn’t infected instead.
Critical Failure As failure, and for as long as the mental link lasts, the target uses an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw against mental spells cast by the conqueror worm.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxTYxEZKkeWVqgJExo_description
attribs.current: When the conqueror worm dies, it telepathically projects its consciousness into a creature infected by its Mental Invader ability and who is on the same plane as the conqueror worm. The creature must succeed at a DC 48 Will save or it is overtaken by the conqueror worm. This has the same effect as the possession spell with an unlimited duration, except the conqueror worm has wholly foregone its physical body. A host body possessed by a conqueror worm undergoes terrible changes. Every day, the host must succeed at a DC 48 Will save or become permanently stupefied 1 (or increase its stupefied value by 1) and increasingly pale, balding, and bloated. When the host reaches stupefied 4, an ectoplasmic cocoon forms around it. Over the next 24 hours, the host undergoes a swift metamorphosis and emerges as a new conqueror worm with all the memories of its previous incarnation. At this point, the host is dead and can’t be restored except by miracle, wish, or similar magic. Before that point, however, this horrid transformation can be ended by any effect that expels the conqueror worm’s possession, meaning would be slayers of a conqueror worm had best locate its consciousness and end the possession before it’s too late and the worm rises again.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxTyG-FhbH4VDUTMVp_description
attribs.current: DC 48, attack +38; 10th (2 slots) fabricated truth, time stop; 9th (4 slots) foresight, overwhelming presence, subconscious suggestion, telepathic demand; 8th (4 slots) discern location, dispel magic, mind blank, unrelenting observation; 7th (4 slots) magic missile, possession, project image, warp mind; 6th (4 slots) dominate, feeblemind, scrying, zealous conviction; 5th (4 slots) dimension door, mind probe, sending, synesthesia; 4th (4 slots) confusion, dream message, modify memory, outcast’s curse; 3rd (4 slots) enthrall, fear, hypercognition, nondetection; 2nd (4 slots) death knell, misdirection, status, telepathic maneuver; 1st (4 slots) mindlink, sanctuary, true strike, ventriloquism; Cantrips (10th) daze, detect magic, mage hand, shield, telekinetic projectile

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxU4teUG0R1xQLj-pb_description
attribs.current: DC 48; 10th dominate; 9th mind reading (at will); Constant (9th) air walk, true seeing

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxU9od6ZE2SD6yXwjn_description
attribs.current: The conqueror worm disgorges acid in a 120-foot-line that deals [[14d10]] (14d10) acid damage to all creatures in the area (DC 44 basic Reflex save). It can’t use Breath Weapon again for [[1d4]] (1d4) rounds.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxUIF2L-cZQMLqU5UD_description
attribs.current: Trigger The conqueror worm Grabs a creature; Effect The worm uses Swallow Whole.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxUMLb4ILqO1CsRghe_description
attribs.current: The conqueror worm selects up to three willing creatures subject to its Mental Invader ability that are on the same plane and teleports them to squares adjacent to the worm of the worm’s choosing.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUkZyV8uwUwjck9bR_description
attribs.current: The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUmXhZjhNYaFZPEZa_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether the conqueror worm sees through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, the conqueror worm can see the creature's true form, but it doesn't end the polymorph spell).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_duration
attribs.current: 1 Round or Sustained Up to 1 Minute

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_description
attribs.current: With a cursory mental touch, a conqueror worm attempts to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to the conqueror worm's mind reading for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_save_failure
attribs.current: The conqueror worm perceives vague surface thoughts from the target when it Cast the Spell, and it finds out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than it.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_save_success
attribs.current: The conqueror worm finds out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than it.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and for the duration of the spell, the conqueror worm can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUnulkBPFnwLSyQI6_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target perceives vague surface thoughts from the conqueror worm when it Cast the Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUpkle5aYCIGjoKVw_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm takes command of the target, forcing it to obey its orders. If the conqueror worm issues an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until it issues a new order. The effect depends on its Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUpkle5aYCIGjoKVw_save_failure
attribs.current: The conqueror worm controls the target. It gains the controlled condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUpkle5aYCIGjoKVw_save_success
attribs.current: The target is stunned 1 as it fights off your commands.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxUpkle5aYCIGjoKVw_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if the conqueror worm gives it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUv5xR9Y6KnWe7soH_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm clouds the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to the conqueror worm's charisma modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUwpaDdlCRbIUaHSH_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) A conqueror worm learns the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which the conqueror worm learns.
Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but a conqueror worm also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, the conqueror worm doesn't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUwpaDdlCRbIUaHSH_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm sends out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. The conqueror worm receives no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. The conqueror worm can choose to ignore magic it's fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of it and its allies.
The conqueror worm detects illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of its detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUyqUnJrZrxTdLVcB_target
attribs.current: 1 Unattended Object of 2 Bulks or Less

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUyqUnJrZrxTdLVcB_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) A conqueror worm can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and a conqueror worm can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and a conqueror worm can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxUyqUnJrZrxTdLVcB_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm creates a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because the conqueror worm's levitating the object, it can move it in any direction. When the conqueror worm Sustain the Spell, it can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV-wpaRQMWCoBk5N4_duration
attribs.current: Until the Start of the Conqueror Worm's Next Turn

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV-wpaRQMWCoBk5N4_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.
Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.
Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.
Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.
Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV-wpaRQMWCoBk5N4_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm raises a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the conqueror worm's next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.
While the spell is in effect, the conqueror worm can use the Shield Block reaction with its magic shield (see the sidebar). The shield has Hardness 5. After the conqueror worm uses Shield Block, the spell ends and it can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, the conqueror worm can use the spell's reaction against the magic missile spell.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV1YkE5gddedsw7Y9_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm hurls a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack against the target. If the conqueror worm hits, it deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object it hurled—equal to 1d6 plus its charisma modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV1YkE5gddedsw7Y9_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The conqueror worm deals double damage.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NKxV1YkE5gddedsw7Y9_save_success
attribs.current: The conqueror worm deal full damage.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV3avkkN-wtsDfknX_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm links its mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV53RUSm3QzhAonvG_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm wards a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV53RUSm3QzhAonvG_save_failure
attribs.current: The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV53RUSm3QzhAonvG_save_success
attribs.current: The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV53RUSm3QzhAonvG_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV6FiIsZVojhMBryg_duration
attribs.current: Until the End of the Conqueror Worm's Turn

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV6FiIsZVojhMBryg_description
attribs.current: A glimpse into the future ensures a conqueror worm's next blow strikes true. The next time the conqueror worm makes an attack roll before the end of its turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV7SKfgCvEFxTSUyS_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and a conqueror worm can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of its voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve its illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV7SKfgCvEFxTSUyS_description
attribs.current: Whenever a conqueror worm speaks or makes any other sound vocally, it can make its vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and it can change that apparent location freely as it vocalizes. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve the conqueror worm's illusion.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV9Zt5-E7t50YvmrM_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm snuffs the life out of a creature on the brink of death. The target must attempt a Will save. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxV9Zt5-E7t50YvmrM_save_success
attribs.current: The target's dying value increases by 1.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVBIX0RFEBjY6yV8p_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time the Conqueror Worm Makes Its Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVBIX0RFEBjY6yV8p_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm reshapes the magic aura of one creature or object to resemble that of another. The conqueror worm designates one target as the primary target and the other as the secondary target. Effects that would detect auras on the primary target instead detect the same types of auras from the secondary target. A creature reading the aura can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. The conqueror worm can Dismiss the spell from up to a mile away.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVDBR4yqwCMV7ecpn_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and a conqueror worm can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVDBR4yqwCMV7ecpn_description
attribs.current: As long as a conqueror worm and the target are on the same plane of existence and both alive, it remains aware of its present state. The conqueror worm knows the target's direction from it, distance from it, and any conditions affecting it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVG7uVZUgojmt980o_description
attribs.current: With a rush of telekinetic power, a conqueror worm moves a foe or something they carry. The conqueror worm can attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVHY8-Nj9IGwvXvR3_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm's words fascinate its targets. The conqueror worm speaks or sings without interruption throughout the casting and duration. Targets who notice the conqueror worm's speech or song might give their undivided attention; each target must attempt a Will save. The GM might grant a circumstance bonus (to a maximum of +4) if the target is of an opposing religion, ancestry, or political leaning, or is otherwise unlikely to agree with what the conqueror worm's saying.
Each creature that comes within range has to attempt a save when the conqueror worm Sustain the Spell. If the conqueror worm's speaking, enthrall gains the linguistic trait.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVHY8-Nj9IGwvXvR3_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is fascinated with the conqueror worm. It can attempt another Will save if it witnesses actions or speech with which it disagrees. If it succeeds, it's no longer fascinated and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. If the target is subject to a hostile act, or if another creature succeeds at a Diplomacy or Intimidation check against it, the fascination ends immediately.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVHY8-Nj9IGwvXvR3_save_success
attribs.current: The target needn't pay attention but doesn't notice the conqueror worm tried to use magic (it might notice others are enthralled).

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVHY8-Nj9IGwvXvR3_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, but the target can't attempt a save to end the fascination if it disagrees with the conqueror worm.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVHY8-Nj9IGwvXvR3_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and notices that the conqueror worm tried to use magic.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVIw6T6ugCJ9zmvfb_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (3rd) A conqueror worm can target up to five creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVIw6T6ugCJ9zmvfb_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm plants fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVIw6T6ugCJ9zmvfb_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVKmAsWrFgISuqnST_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm rapidly catalogues and collates information relevant to its current situation. The conqueror worm can instantly use up to 6 Recall Knowledge actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, the conqueror worm can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when it Recall Knowledge.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVMLpPL1IwnKfe0vz_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm erects protective wards that make the target difficult to detect via magic. Nondetection attempts to counteract all detection, revelation, and scrying divinations made against the target or the target's gear throughout the duration, counting cantrips as 1st-level spells for this purpose. Successfully counteracting a divination that targets an area or multiple targets negates the effects only for nondetection's target.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVO-rmDZgaZc5ZZay_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (8th) A conqueror worm can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVO-rmDZgaZc5ZZay_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm befuddles its target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. The conqueror worm can Dismiss the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVO-rmDZgaZc5ZZay_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is confused for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVO-rmDZgaZc5ZZay_save_success
attribs.current: The target babbles incoherently and is stunned 1.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVO-rmDZgaZc5ZZay_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVQhwYYf9X0Jlndnu_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature the Conqueror Worm Knows by Name and Have Met in Person

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVQhwYYf9X0Jlndnu_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm sends a message to its target's dream. The message is one-way, up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words). If the target is asleep, they receive the message instantly. If not, they receive it the next time they sleep. As soon as they receive it, the spell ends, and the conqueror worm knows the message was sent.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVQhwYYf9X0Jlndnu_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) A conqueror worm can target up to 10 creatures it knows by name and have met in person. The conqueror worm must send the same message to all of them; the spell ends for each creature individually.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVSR8H28V7Fgqm1gS_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (6th) A conqueror worm can cast the spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVSR8H28V7Fgqm1gS_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm alters the target's memories, either erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.
Any memories the conqueror worm's altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, the conqueror worm can't alter any further memories.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVSR8H28V7Fgqm1gS_save_failure
attribs.current: During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, the conqueror worm can Sustain the Spell to modify a memory once each round. When the conqueror worm does, it imagines up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVSR8H28V7Fgqm1gS_save_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected but thinks the conqueror worm's spell was something harmless instead of modify memory, unless it identifies the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVSR8H28V7Fgqm1gS_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and realizes the conqueror worm tried to alter its memory.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVTmJ5-lMcYXKHS30_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm afflicts the target with a curse that makes its presence abrasive and off-putting. The target must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVTmJ5-lMcYXKHS30_save_failure
attribs.current: As success, but the effect is permanent.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVTmJ5-lMcYXKHS30_save_success
attribs.current: For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check, and creatures they encounter have an initial attitude toward them of one step worse (for instance, unfriendly instead of indifferent).

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVTmJ5-lMcYXKHS30_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and creatures that the target encounters have an initial attitude toward them of two steps worse.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVXaEdYnYuOt0Lu5G_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. A conqueror worm doesn't need to be able to see its destination, as long as it has been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from it. The conqueror worm is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVXaEdYnYuOt0Lu5G_description
attribs.current: Opening a door that bypasses normal space, a conqueror worm instantly transports itself and any items it's wearing and holding from its current space to a clear space within range it can see. If this would bring another creature with the conqueror worm—even if it's carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVZgCmq087jZNJSLt_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm casts its thoughts through a creature's mind, sifting for information. The conqueror worm accesses the target's memories and knowledge unless it fends its off with a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVZgCmq087jZNJSLt_save_failure
attribs.current: Each round of the spell's duration, the conqueror worm can Sustain the Spell to ask a different question and attempt to uncover the answer. For each question, the target can attempt a Deception check against the conqueror worm's spell DC; if the target succeeds, it doesn't learn the answer, and on a critical success, the target gives it a false answer that it believes is truthful Once the conqueror worm's asked the target a given question, asking it again, even with a separate casting of mind probe, produces the same result.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVZgCmq087jZNJSLt_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and the target takes a –4 circumstance penalty to Deception checks against the conqueror worm's questions.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVZZIkoeZJFP0l6RE_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature with Whom the Conqueror Worm is Familiar

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVZZIkoeZJFP0l6RE_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm sends the creature a mental message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVbheHwyUShsS2Vni_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (9th) A conqueror worm can target up to five creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVbheHwyUShsS2Vni_description
attribs.current:
The target's senses are suddenly rewired in unexpected ways, causing them to process noises as bursts of colour, smells as sounds, and so on. This has three effects, and the target must attempt a Will save.
• Due to the distraction, the target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check each time it uses a concentrate action, or the action fails and is wasted.
• The target's difficulty processing visual input makes all creatures and objects concealed from it.
• The creature has trouble moving, making it clumsy 3 and giving it a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVbheHwyUShsS2Vni_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is affected for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVbheHwyUShsS2Vni_save_success
attribs.current: The target is affected for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVbheHwyUShsS2Vni_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and the target is stunned 2 as it attempts to process the sensory shifts.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVdWQSmJ85SMU2FOm_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time the Conqueror Worm Makes Its Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVdWQSmJ85SMU2FOm_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm takes command of the target, forcing it to obey its orders. If the conqueror worm issues an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until it issues a new order. The effect depends on its Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVdWQSmJ85SMU2FOm_save_failure
attribs.current: The conqueror worm controls the target. It gains the controlled condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVdWQSmJ85SMU2FOm_save_success
attribs.current: The target is stunned 1 as it fights off your commands.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVdWQSmJ85SMU2FOm_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if the conqueror worm gives it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVevKb1M6R6JRWGxt_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm drastically reduces the target's mental faculties. The target must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVevKb1M6R6JRWGxt_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is stupefied 4 with an unlimited duration.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVevKb1M6R6JRWGxt_save_success
attribs.current: The target is stupefied 2 for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVevKb1M6R6JRWGxt_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target's intellect is permanently reduced below that of an animal, and it treats its Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers as –5. It loses all class abilities that require mental faculties, including all spellcasting. If the target is a PC, they become an NPC under the GM's control.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVgRjlDXV9QfESuWb_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm magically spies on a creature of its choice. Scrying works like clairvoyance, except that the image the conqueror worm receive is less precise, insufficient for teleport and similar spells. Instead of creating an eye in a set location within 500 feet, the conqueror worm instead creates an eye that manifests just above the target. The conqueror worm can choose a target either by name or by touching one of its possessions or a piece of its body. If the conqueror worm hasn't met the target in person, scrying's DC is 2 lower, and if the conqueror worm is unaware of the target's identity (perhaps because the conqueror worm found an unknown creature's fang at a crime scene), the DC is instead 10 lower.
The effect of scrying depends on the target's Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVgRjlDXV9QfESuWb_save_success
attribs.current: The spell fails and the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVgRjlDXV9QfESuWb_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The spell succeeds, and the eye follows the target if it moves, traveling up to 60 feet per round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVgRjlDXV9QfESuWb_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The spell fails and the target is temporarily immune for 1 week. The target also gains a glimpse of the conqueror worm and learns its rough distance and direction from it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVhuZQxRnxwOPph6t_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (9th) The temporary Hit Points increase to 18, and the status bonus to Will saves increases to +3.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVhuZQxRnxwOPph6t_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm bypasses its targets' rational minds, instilling them with unshakable conviction and zeal. The targets each gain 12 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to Will saves against mental effects, as their faith overrides the signals from their own bodies and minds. If the conqueror worm tells a target to do something, it must comply with its request, though if it would normally find the task repugnant, it can attempt a Will save at the end of its turn each round due to the cognitive dissonance. On a success, it ends the spell's effects on itself entirely.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVyriNIVl-hU3pjxi_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+2) A conqueror worm shoot one additional missile with each action it spends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxVyriNIVl-hU3pjxi_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm sends a dart of force streaking toward a creature that it can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action the conqueror worm usse when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles it shoots by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. The conqueror worm choose the target for each missile individually. If the conqueror worm shoots more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW14BoBoBkZ8epJxy_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (9th) The duration is 10 minutes, and a conqueror worm can physically enter the creature's body, protecting its physical body while the spell lasts.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW14BoBoBkZ8epJxy_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm send its mind and soul into the target's body, attempting to take control. The target must attempt a Will save. The conqueror worm can choose to use the effects of a degree of success more favourable to the target if it prefers.
While the conqueror worm's possessing a target, its own body is unconscious and can't wake up normally. The conqueror worm can sense everything the possessed target does. The conqueror worm can Dismiss this spell. If the possessed body dies, the spell ends and the conqueror worm must succeed at a Fortitude save against its spell DC or be paralyzed for 1 hour, or 24 hours on a critical failure. If the spell ends during an encounter, the conqueror worm acts just before the possessed creature's initiative count.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW14BoBoBkZ8epJxy_save_failure
attribs.current: The conqueror worm possesses the target and takes partial control of it. The conqueror worm no longer has a separate turn; instead, it might control the target. At the start of each of the target's turns, it attempts another Will save. If it fails, it's controlled by the conqueror worm on that turn; if it succeeds, it chooses its own actions; and if it critically succeeds, it forces it out and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW14BoBoBkZ8epJxy_save_success
attribs.current: The conqueror worm possesses the target but can't control it. The conqueror worm rides along in the body while the spell lasts.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW14BoBoBkZ8epJxy_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The conqueror worm possesses the target fully, and it can only watch as it manipulates it like a puppet. The target is controlled by the conqueror worm.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW2VRtMKFFiCQAc-Z_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+2) The maximum duration the conqueror worm can Sustain the Spell increases to 10 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW2VRtMKFFiCQAc-Z_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm projects an illusory image of itself. The conqueror worm must stay within range of the image, and if at any point it can't see the image, the spell ends. Whenever the conqueror worm Cast a Spell other than one whose area is an emanation, it can cause the spell effect to originate from either itself or the image. Because the image is an illusion, it can't benefit from spells, though visual manifestations of the spell appear. The image has the same AC and saves as it. If it is hit by an attack or fails a save, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW4DQAGySTFOHFzsl_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm scrambles a creature's mental faculties and sensory input. The target must attempt a Will saving throw. Regardless of the result of that save, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. Warp mind's effects happen instantly, so dispel magic and other effects that counteract spells can't counteract them. However, alter reality, miracle, primal phenomenon, restoration, or wish can still counteract the effects.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW4DQAGySTFOHFzsl_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is confused for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW4DQAGySTFOHFzsl_save_success
attribs.current: The target spends the first action on its next turn with the confused condition.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW5V1gwrITjsq487W_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm learns the name of the target's exact location (including the building, community, and country) and plane of existence.
The conqueror worm can target a creature only if it's seen it in person, have one of its significant belongings, or have a piece of its body. To target an object, the conqueror worm must have touched it or have a fragment of it. Discern location automatically overcomes protections against detection and divination of lower level than this spell, even if they would normally have a chance to block it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW6tHA9HPBrAZxR6r_target
attribs.current: 1 Spell Effect or Unattended Magic Item

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW6tHA9HPBrAZxR6r_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm unravels the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. Counteracting a Magic Item causes it to become mundane for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, the conqueror worm automatically fails.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW8UrcjZSljUIPi2m_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time the Conqueror Worm Makes Its Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxW8UrcjZSljUIPi2m_description
attribs.current: Powerful wards hide a creature from divination magic. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Mind blank attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell level were 1 higher than its actual level. On a success, the divination effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWCD0qn-RMJNMoMFR_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature or Object Tracked and Up to 5 Other Willing Creatures

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWCD0qn-RMJNMoMFR_description
attribs.current:
This spell grants perfect sight based on scrying, allowing several willing targets to track the exact movements or position of one creature or object. Choose one target creature or object in the area to be tracked. It becomes the sensor for the spell. Up to five willing creatures of a conqueror worm's choice in the area can see a ghostly image of this creature or object when it's out of their sight. They can perceive the creature or object perfectly, allowing them to ignore the concealed or invisible condition, though physical barriers still provide cover.
The tracking creatures can see the tracked creature or object through all barriers other than lead or running water, which block their vision. Distance doesn't matter, though the creature or object might move so far away it becomes too small to perceive. The tracking creatures don't see any of the environment around the target, though they do see any gear a creature is wearing or holding, and they can tell if it removes objects from its person.
If the target to be tracked is willing, the duration is 1 hour. If the conqueror worm tries to track an unwilling creature, the target must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWCD0qn-RMJNMoMFR_save_failure
attribs.current: As described, and the duration is 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWCD0qn-RMJNMoMFR_save_success
attribs.current: As described, and the duration is 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWCD0qn-RMJNMoMFR_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The creature or object is unaffected.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWE5kemiIBR8B8r43_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm gains a sixth sense that warns it of danger that might befall the target of the spell. If the conqueror worm chooses a creature other than itself as the target, it creates a psychic link through which it can inform the target of danger. This link is a mental effect. Due to the amount of information this spell requires the conqueror worm to process, it can't have more than one foresight spell in effect at a time. Casting foresight again ends the previous foresight. While foresight is in effect, the target gains a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and isn't flat-footed against undetected creatures or when flanked. In addition, the conqueror worm gains the following reaction.
Foresight [reaction] Trigger The target of foresight defends against a hostile creature or other danger. Effect If the hostile creature or danger forces the target to roll dice (a saving throw, for example), the target rolls twice and uses the higher result, and this spell gains the fortune trait. But if the hostile creature or danger is rolling against the target (an attack roll or skill check, for example), that hostile creature or danger rolls twice and uses the lower result, and this spell gains the misfortune trait.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWGL2fQ-vt8jOMpgz_description
attribs.current:
A conqueror worm surrounds yourself with supernatural splendour, appearing to be a god or similarly majestic being. The conqueror worm chooses the aspects of its new majestic appearance. This causes the targets to pay tribute to the conqueror worm by bowing or using some other action in keeping with its appearance. The number of times a target must do this depends on the result of their Will save.
Paying tribute is a manipulate action or move action, as chosen by the creature paying tribute. A creature under this effect must pay tribute to the conqueror worm at least once on each of its turns if possible. While affected by this spell, a creature is fascinated by the conqueror worm and can't use hostile actions against it. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWGL2fQ-vt8jOMpgz_save_failure
attribs.current: The target must pay tribute six times.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWGL2fQ-vt8jOMpgz_save_success
attribs.current: The target must pay tribute twice.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWGL2fQ-vt8jOMpgz_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and the target must spend all its actions paying tribute if possible.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (9th) A conqueror worm can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm implants a subconscious suggestion deep within the target's mind for them to follow when a trigger it specifies  occurs. The conqueror worm suggests a course of action to the target. The conqueror worm's directive must be phrased in such a way as to seem like a logical course of action to the target, and it can't be self-destructive or obviously against the target's self-interest. The target must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_save_failure
attribs.current: The suggestion remains in the target's subconscious until the next time the conqueror worm prepares. If the trigger occurs before then, the target immediately follows the conqueror worm's suggestion. The effect has a duration of 1 minute, or until the target has completed a finite suggestion or the suggestion becomes self-destructive or has other obvious negative effects.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_save_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and thinks the conqueror worm was talking to them normally, not casting a spell on them.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, but the duration is 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWIO8NjFiPvvdm-af_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and knows the conqueror worm tried to control it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWJpbRn9BrtRHunKv_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature the Conqueror Worm's Telepathically Contacted Before

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWJpbRn9BrtRHunKv_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm sends the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. The conqueror worm's message is insidious and has the effect of suggestion, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. The conqueror worm can target a creature only if it has previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the telepathy spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWMgNQmSDLSsTBCX7_description
attribs.current:
Choose a single statement a conqueror worm wants the targets to believe. The fact could be narrow, such as “a dragon is circling overhead and wants to kill me”; wide-reaching, such as “all humanoids are disguised abominations”; or conceptual, such as “if I don't live a kinder life, I'll be punished in the afterlife.” The targets' experiences colour how they react to this “truth” and how their behavior changes. If the statement changes what they perceive, they treat the change as a sudden revelation.
The effect of the spell depends on the targets' Will saves. If a target is already subject to fabricated truth, the conqueror worm's spell tries to counteract it. If the counteract check fails, the outcome of the target's saving throw can't be worse than a success.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWMgNQmSDLSsTBCX7_save_failure
attribs.current: The target believes the statement for a duration of 1 week.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWMgNQmSDLSsTBCX7_save_success
attribs.current: The target doesn't believe the statement or realize you tried to trick it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWMgNQmSDLSsTBCX7_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target believes the statement with unlimited duration.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWMgNQmSDLSsTBCX7_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target doesn't believe the statement, and it knows you tried to trick it.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NKxWNmjlOc9pV4Ehg3q_description
attribs.current: A conqueror worm temporarily stops time for everything but itself, allowing it to use several actions in what appears to others to be no time at all. Immediately after casting time stop, the conqueror worm can use up to 9 actions in 3 sets of up to 3 actions each. After each set of actions, 1 round passes, but only for the conqueror worm, effects specifically targeting or affecting it, and effects it creates during the stoppage. All other creatures and objects are invulnerable to the conqueror worm attacks, and it can't target or affect them with anything. Once the conqueror worm has finished it actions, time begins to flow again for the rest of the world. If the conqueror wormcreated an effect with a duration that extends beyond the time stop's duration, such as wall of fire, it immediately affects others again, but it doesn't have any of the effects that happen only when the conqueror worm first casts the spell.

attribs.name: immunities
attribs.current: Disease, Fear, Paralyzed, Poison, Precision, Unconscious

attribs.name: resistances
attribs.current: All Damage 15 (Except Force, Ghost Touch, or Positive; Double Resistance vs. Non-Magical

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxXk1cQDtYZu6F2zUA_description
attribs.current: A gray death senses the vital essence of living creatures within range.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxXol-sIDJhckveGcE_description
attribs.current: 1,000 feet. Creatures that begin their turn in the area take [[5d6]] (5d6) negative damage and must succeed at a DC 42 Fortitude save or become doomed 1. If the creature is 13th level or lower, this doomed condition from soul bleed is cumulative, increasing by 1 with each failed save until the creature dies (typically at doomed 4).

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxY3aoCfzeZP5tyj1R_description
attribs.current: The gray death makes up to four hand Strikes, each against a different target it can reach. It increases its reach to 100 feet with these Strikes. These Strikes count as one attack for the gray death’s multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn’t increase until after the attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxY9IcJ4Cx14LJDeq0_description
attribs.current: A creature damaged by the gray death’s hand Strike must succeed at a DC 42 Fortitude save or become drained 1, and paralyzed for 1 round on a critical failure.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxYCxXfcdyqOjzg1pR_description
attribs.current: Frequency once per round; Effect The gray death chooses a living creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a DC 42 Will save or a fragment of embittered soul-stuff lodges within the target’s spirit and turns it against its allies. While the target has this fragment, it doesn’t count as anyone’s ally for the purposes of providing flanking, and a would-be ally casting a spell that normally works only on an ally on the creature must succeed at a DC 42 counteract check (level 20) or the spell has no effect. The fragment fades after 24 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxYL5WBZZge6ClS0q8_description
attribs.current: The gray death isn’t slowed 1 when it starts its turn inside an object.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxZ9aKWiZzdr8wSS8a_description
attribs.current: A riekanoy’s swaying motions propel it into the fray with grace. While a riekanoy can act and isn’t immobilized, it can roll Performance for initiative.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxZQBxXeH-gS3ZqDU6_rep_traits
attribs.current: Concentrate, Enchantment, Incapacitation, Mental, Primal, Visual

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxZQBxXeH-gS3ZqDU6_description
attribs.current:
The riekanoy sways in a compelling fashion. Each non-fey creature within a 300-foot emanation that can see the riekanoy must attempt a DC 38 Will save. The effect lasts for 1 round, but if the riekanoy uses Beckoning Dance again on subsequent rounds, the duration extends by 1 round for all affected creatures. Once a creature succeeds at any save against Beckoning Dance, that creature is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
Success The creature is unaffected.
Failure The creature is fascinated and must spend each of its actions to move closer to the riekanoy, avoiding obvious dangers. If a beckoned creature is adjacent to the riekanoy, it stays still and doesn’t act. If attacked by the riekanoy, the creature is freed from captivation at the end of the riekanoy’s turn.
Critical Failure As failure, but if attacked by the riekanoy, the creature can attempt a new save only at the start of its next turn, rather than being freed at the end of the riekanoy’s turn.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxZiNgO97g6BmeKhFW_description
attribs.current: A riekanoy can have up to eight creatures grabbed within their hair at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxZmZ7g6ZtOLm1adbc_description
attribs.current: The riekanoy attempts an Acrobatics check against each grabbed creature’s Reflex DC. The riekanoy moves each creature they succeed against up to 10 feet and each creature they critically succeed against up to 20 feet. This movement must all be within reach of its hair.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxZqlYF5zPun0xOEuH_description
attribs.current: DC 41, attack +33; 9th hydraulic torrent, nature’s enmity; 8th charm (at will), fire seeds (×3; see water lilies); 6th baleful polymorph (×3, aquatic animals only); 5th control water (at will); 2nd invisibility (at will), obscuring mist (at will); Constant (9th) true seeing, water walk

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa1FCl1hiQoZ7N1yz_description
attribs.current: A riekanoy sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether the riekanoy sees through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, the riekanoy can see the creature's true form, but it doesn't end the polymorph spell).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa2JAVWxDIHwpnQMI_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa2JAVWxDIHwpnQMI_description
attribs.current: The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must Swim normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa5E65ejp8HlhRZyZ_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa5E65ejp8HlhRZyZ_description
attribs.current: Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa6bFEIeqU9cRd-Bs_description
attribs.current: A riekanoy calls forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become concealed, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. The riekanoy can Dismiss the cloud.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxa9JihYGtWQzYLlP7_description
attribs.current: By imposing its will upon the water, a riekanoy can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of slow.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaAypltY6FPwHdznT_description
attribs.current: A riekanoy transforms the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaAypltY6FPwHdznT_save_failure
attribs.current: The target transforms for 1 minute but keeps its˙mind. If it spends all its actions on its turn concentrating on its original form, it can attempt a Will save to end the effect˙immediately.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaAypltY6FPwHdznT_save_success
attribs.current: The target’s body gains minor features of the harmless animal. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be sickened 1. When it recovers from the sickened condition, its features revert to normal.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaAypltY6FPwHdznT_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is transformed into the chosen harmless animal, body and mind, for an unlimited duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time the Riekanoy Makes Its Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time the riekanoy makes its daily preparations.
Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time the riekanoy makes its daily preparations, and it can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_description
attribs.current:
To the target, the riekanoy's words are honey and its visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if the riekanoy or its allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it. 
The riekanoy can Dismiss the spell. If the riekanoy uses hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn 't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with the riekanoy or the actions it convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning it could potentially convince the target to continue being its friend via mundane means.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_save_failure
attribs.current: The target 's attitude becomes friendly toward the riekanoy. If it was friendly, it becomes helpful. It can 't use hostile actions against the riekanoy.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_save_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected but thinks the riekanoy's spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell (usually by using Identifying Magic, see Identifying Spells).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target 's attitude becomes helpful toward the riekanoy, and it can 't use hostile actions against the riekanoy.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaDT8X6On0mzlrQGm_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and aware the riekanoy tried to charm it.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaG0FMKURShPEOYu0_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (8th) The burst's damage increases to 5d6, and the continuing flames damage increases to 3d6.
Heightened (9th) The burst's damage increases to 6d6, and the continuing flames damage increases to 3d6.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaG0FMKURShPEOYu0_description
attribs.current:
Four acorns grow in a riekanoy's hand, their shells streaked with pulsing red and orange patterns. The riekanoy or anyone else who has one of the acorns can toss it up to 30 feet with an Interact action. It explodes in a 5-foot burst, dealing 4d6 fire damage. The save uses the riekanoy's spell DC, even if someone else throws the acorn.
Flames continue to burn on the ground in the burst for 1 minute, dealing 2d6 fire damage to any creature that enters the flames or ends its turn within them. A creature can take damage from the continuing flames only once per round, even if it's in overlapping areas of fire created by different acorns.
When the spell ends, any remaining acorns rot and turn to ordinary soil.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaM4KYiBAq91T6VLi_description
attribs.current: A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering those that are its path and possibly pushing them away from a riekanoy. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. Creatures that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaM4KYiBAq91T6VLi_damage_additional
attribs.current: Knocked Back [[5]] feet ([[10]] feet on Critical Failure)

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxaNjVfr3u2yVqZEyY_description
attribs.current:
Animals and plants in the area turn against the targets. Each target suffers from the following effects as long as it remains in the area.
• Vegetation springs up from every surface, giving each target a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed any time it's adjacent to the plants.
• Aggressive animals attack unpredictably. At the start of its turn, each target rolls a DC 8 flat check. On a failure, it's attacked by swarming creatures that deal 2d10 slashing damage. The target attempts a basic Reflex save, and it is flat-footed for 1 round on any outcome other than a critical success.
• The target loses any connection to nature or natural creatures. The target has to succeed at a DC 5 flat check when casting any primal spell or the spell fails. Furthermore, animal or plant creatures become hostile to it, even one with a strong bond to the target, such as an animal companion. 
The GM might decide that a riekanoy can't subject some creatures, such as an emissary of a nature deity, to the ire of nature.

attribs.name: languages
attribs.current: Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, Requian; Telepathy 100 feet

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxc0Y0W47ESoRgfi3x_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj knows when a creature within 30 feet lies unless that creature critically succeeds on its Perception check to lie to the chakanaj. This ability doesn’t reveal the truth.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxc44ljIppXG4zwOnV_description
attribs.current: A sahkil’s level is considered 2 lower for the purpose of being conjured by the planar binding ritual (and potentially other rituals, at the GM’s discretion), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster’s check is a critical success.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxc9DnsIlI3q9-ymOu_trigger
attribs.current: A creature within the chakanaj’s reach attacks its host;

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxc9DnsIlI3q9-ymOu_description
attribs.current: Requirements The chakanaj is Bonded with a Host; Effect The chakanaj makes a leg Strike against the triggering creature. If the chakanaj was Impersonating clothing when it makes this strike, the Impersonation ends.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxcLayhQJkK5bLVryK_description
attribs.current: Requirements The chakanaj is adjacent to a willing creature; Effect The chakanaj enters the space of the creature (thereafter called its host) and covers a suitable surface on the host, such as the face or back. The chakanaj occupies the same space as its host and moves with its host. It doesn’t impair the host’s senses or movement. While worn, the chakanaj establishes a constant shield other effect with its host. Attacks that target the chakanaj target the host instead, but use the higher AC or saving throw values between the chakanaj and the host. Area effects apply to both the chakanaj and the host, as normal for an area of effect.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxcUm8Ize8f5h-o0zV_description
attribs.current: Requirements The chakanaj is Bonded with a Host; Effect The chakanaj interposes itself between the host and its foes, granting its host a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the chakanaj’s next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxcYHv1rmvAwqLfoRX_description
attribs.current: Requirements The chakanaj is Bonded with a Host; Effect the chakanaj removes itself from its host, peeling off the host's body and enters an adjacent space.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxcc1nYAAQwHWdY5Ud_description
attribs.current: The chakanaj sahkil moves from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa, with the effects of ethereal jaunt except the effect has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed. A summoned sahkil can’t use Skip Between.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxcjTHN8V1ukVgFTfQ_description
attribs.current: DC 34; 7th fear (at will), mask of terror (at will, self only); 5th illusory object (×3), Cantrips (7th) dancing lights, daze, guidance; Constant (7th) true seeing

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcqcL2bYFy9myLnjO_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether the chakanaj sees through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, the chakanaj can see the creature's true form, but it doesn't end the polymorph spell).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcrqw0DgHzYhAUDcZ_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj creates up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When the chakanaj Sustain the Spell, it can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of the chakanaj and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxctAWOZYO5A-nnfW-_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj clouds the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to the chakanaj's charisma modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcuMnadOSvII9FarV_duration
attribs.current: Until the Start of the Chakanaj's Next Turn

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcuMnadOSvII9FarV_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj asks for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcxRH92uj1p9s62rh_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (2nd) A chakanaj's image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory and olfactory traits. The duration increases to 1 hour.
Heightened (5th) As the 2nd-level version, but the duration is unlimited.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxcxRH92uj1p9s62rh_description
attribs.current:
A chakanaj creates an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within the spell's area. The object appears to animate naturally, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. For example, water would appear to pour down an illusory waterfall, but it would be silent.
Any creature that touches the image or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve the chakanaj's illusion.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxczhVYZxPGf4qbRlf_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (3rd) A chakanaj can target up to five creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxczhVYZxPGf4qbRlf_description
attribs.current: A chakanaj plants fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxczhVYZxPGf4qbRlf_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxd1EH087tQw-371K3_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (8th) A chakanaj can target up to 5 creatures. If a creature uses a hostile action or reaction that affects multiple targets simultaneously, it needs to attempt only one save against mask of terror.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxd1EH087tQw-371K3_description
attribs.current:
The target appears to be a gruesome and terrifying creature. The effect is unique to each observer, so a human viewing the target might see a demon with bloody fangs, but a demon observing the target might see a glowing angelic visage.
When any creature attempts a hostile action against the target, the creature must attempt a Will save. It is then temporarily immune until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxd1EH087tQw-371K3_save_failure
attribs.current: The creature becomes frightened 2 before using its action.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxd1EH087tQw-371K3_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The creature becomes frightened 2, and its action fails and is wasted.

attribs.name: languages
attribs.current: Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, Requian; Telepathy 100 feet

attribs.name: resistances
attribs.current: Physical 15 (Except Force or Ghost Touch; Double Resistance vs. Non-Magical)

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxduCWFM64bhCLkD4x_description
attribs.current: Unlike most incorporeal creatures, a tumblak can make Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects if it chooses, though such creatures still can't make Strength-based checks against the tumblak.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKxe-kHCauhjD4ATFKC_description
attribs.current: 100 feet. Creatures within the aura must succeed at a DC 37 Fortitude save. On a failure, they can’t breathe and must hold their breath to avoid suffocation until they leave the aura. The tumblak can activate or deactivate the aura with a single free action, which has the concentrate trait.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxeGXp1Di7R5FY0trN_description
attribs.current: A creature fatigued by the tumblak’s nightmarespell is subject to paralyzing glimpses of being buried alive. Anyone using an effect that would remove the fatigued condition through a means other than a full night’s rest must succeed on a DC 44 counteract check or the fatigued condition isn’t removed. When the fatigued creature enters a stressful situation, such as rolling initiative in combat or entering a high-stakes negotiation, it is affected by Entombing Echoes.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxeN97oAUnc5rK5Qu7_description
attribs.current: A creature struck by the tumblak’s fist or impacted by Claustrophobic Nightmares must succeed on a DC 44 Will save or feel itself confined on all sides. The creature is immobilized and flat-footed until it Escapes (DC 44).

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKxeWYr5VJOPfQ1ulRQ_description
attribs.current: DC 40; 9th dispel magic, earthbind (at will), fear (at will), mask of terror (at will, self only), nightmare (at will); Cantrips (9th) detect magic; Constant (9th) true seeing

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxed-2nOep1nbXdFEB_description
attribs.current: A tumblak sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether the tumblak sees through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, the tumblak can see the creature's true form, but it doesn't end the polymorph spell).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxeeSh9Ue5S3ZDpD7B_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) A tumblak learns the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which the tumblak learns.
Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but a tumblak also pinpoints the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, the tumblak doesn't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxeeSh9Ue5S3ZDpD7B_description
attribs.current:
A tumblak sends out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. The tumblak receives no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. The tumblak can choose to ignore magic it's fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of it and its allies.
The tumblak detects illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of its detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxeh5uW9i9IytvrJjf_target
attribs.current: 1 Spell Effect or Unattended Magic Item

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxeh5uW9i9IytvrJjf_description
attribs.current: A tumblak unravels the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. Counteracting a Magic Item causes it to become mundane for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, the tumblak automatically fails.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxejSldWgl8ZS05ZWZ_description
attribs.current: Using the weight of earth, a tumblak hampers a target's flight, with effects based on its Fortitude save. If the creature reaches the ground safely, it doesn't take falling damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxejSldWgl8ZS05ZWZ_save_failure
attribs.current: The target falls safely up to 120 feet. If it hits the ground, it can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxejSldWgl8ZS05ZWZ_save_success
attribs.current: The target falls safely up to 120 feet.

attribs.current: The target falls safely up to 120 feet. If it hits the ground, it can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.

attribs.current: 1 Creature the Tumblak Knows by name

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxen94gqo5uYQmZZBl_description
attribs.current: A tumblak sends disturbing nightmares to its target. The next time the target falls asleep, it must attempt a Will save. If the tumblak knows the target only by name and have never met them, the target gets a +4 circumstance bonus to the Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxen94gqo5uYQmZZBl_save_failure
attribs.current: The target experiences the nightmares and awakens fatigued.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxen94gqo5uYQmZZBl_save_success
attribs.current: The target experiences the nightmares but suffers no adverse effects other than unpleasant memories.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxen94gqo5uYQmZZBl_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target experiences the nightmares, awakens fatigued, and is drained 2 until it is no longer fatigued.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NKxen94gqo5uYQmZZBl_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target suffers no adverse effects and is temporarily immune for 1 week.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKxdscu5Cfa3eODvFj2_description

attribs.current: The tumblak sahkil moves from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa, with the effects of ethereal jaunt except the effect has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed. A summoned sahkil can’t use Skip Between.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKU87ozBnm1jTZgxd-f_description
attribs.current: Keznin can use Nature instead of Medicine to Treat Disease, Treat Poison, and Treat Wounds, and he can use Nature instead of Crafting to craft alchemical items with the healing trait, antidotes, and antiplagues.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKU8EOTVH0Zuo9tKR9G_description
attribs.current: Trigger Keznin rolls a critical failure on a check to Treat Disease, Treat Poison, or Treat Wounds; EffectKeznin gives an emergency application of dangerous herbs to avert further harm. The creature Keznin is treating takes [[2d6]] (2d6) poison damage, and Keznin rerolls the check.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NKU9AZb4QZy9IHDoDEx_description
attribs.current: The Gray Gardener enforcer spends 1 hour consuming 1 Bulk of raw meat to reverse their body’s putrescence. For 1 hour, the Gray Gardener enforcer appears to be a pale, bloated human. They have an automatic result of 32 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as a non-mortic human. While under the effects of Nourishing Feast, Rotting Flesh ceases to function.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKU9Hza2KLTZmATDA94_description
attribs.current: The Gray Gardener enforcer has a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks and saving throws to conceal their identity and a +2 circumstance bonus to their Deception DC against effects that ferret out information about the Gray Gardener’s identity.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKU9MDjHdGBvcWnAm4h_description
attribs.current: A Gray Gardener enforcer in a place of worship dedicated to a non-evil deity or on sacred ground, such as an area blessed by sanctified ground, is slowed 1.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKU9Qvd5B4qwhCCXTUD_description
attribs.current: Any creature that hits the Gray Gardener enforcer with an unarmed attack, tries to Grapple them, or otherwise touches the gurgist is covered with rotten flesh and putrid fluids. The creature must succeed at a DC 36 Fortitude save or become sickened 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure).

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKU9VMc1JiSN1ItD0ej_trigger
attribs.current: The Gray Gardener enforcer rolls a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against an effect with the mental or fear trait;

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NKU9VMc1JiSN1ItD0ej_description
attribs.current: Requirements The Gray Gardener enforcer’s features are obscured by a mask or hood; Effect The Gray Gardener enforcer takes [[3d8]] (3d8) mental damage, and the saving throw is a success.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKU9s0yiY89hEx2v52V_description
attribs.current: The Gray Gardener enforcer’s spiked chain Strike deals [[2d8]] (2d8) persistent bleed damage, and they can use it to Grab up to two foes. The enforcer can still attack with their spiked chain if they Grab one creature, but not when they Grab two.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NKUA23qoCncx6WG-H8R_description
attribs.current: The Gray Gardener enforcer draws in a deep breath and holds it, temporarily suspending their biological processes and becoming undead. The Gray Gardener enforcer gains the undead trait and becomes immune to bleed, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, and sleep. Any such effects the Gray Gardener is currently suffering from are suspended but take effect again once they take a breath. Death Gasp lasts as long as the Gray Gardener enforcer holds their breath (up to 10 rounds; Pathfinder Core Rulebook 478).
